alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Gloucester; James City; Mathews; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 20 at 8:57PM EST until January 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM EST FRIDAY THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations from a trace to up to one inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 30 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and southeast Virginia. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight EST tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, from 7 AM EST Friday through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.

area.areaDesc: Accomack; Gloucester; James City; Mathews; Surry; Sussex
